description: The AWS::RDS::DBParameterGroup resource creates a custom parameter group for an RDS database family

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

DBParameterGroupName.description: Specifies the name of the DB parameter group
DBParameterGroupName.markdownDescription:
Specifies the name of the DB parameter group

---

Required: No

Type: string    

Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z]{1}(?:-?[a-zA-Z0-9])*$  

Update requires: No interruption

Description.description: Provides the customer-specified description for this DB parameter group.
Description.markdownDescription:
Provides the customer-specified description for this DB parameter group.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

Family.description: The DB parameter group family name.
Family.markdownDescription:
The DB parameter group family name.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

Parameters.description: An array of parameter names and values for the parameter update.
Parameters.markdownDescription:
An array of parameter names and values for the parameter update.

---

Required: No

Type: object     

Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.
Tags.markdownDescription:
An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

---

Type: array
